meta.description: Terms governing use of the GoLynk logistics orchestration platform and corridor-based deployment services.

items.question: What is GoLynk?
items.answer: GoLynk is an AI-powered logistics platform that intelligently routes shipments through a network of existing vehicles, trains, microhubs, and lockers—delivering faster, cheaper, and with significantly lower emissions than traditional courier services. We orchestrate unused capacity to create a woven, efficient logistics web.

items.question: What problem does GoLynk solve?
items.answer: Today, logistics is fragmented and wasteful: trucks run 20–35% empty, cars operate at only 30% capacity, and shippers pay premium rates for inefficient routing. GoLynk matches shipments to available capacity in real time, eliminating waste and reducing costs for everyone.

items.question: How is GoLynk different from traditional couriers?
items.answer: Traditional couriers own vehicles and charge fixed rates. GoLynk doesn't own vehicles; instead, we coordinate shipments across existing capacity (trucks, trains, vans, bikes) and microhubs, which enables lower costs, more flexibility, and no new infrastructure—just smarter coordination.

items.question: Who does GoLynk serve?
items.answer: Shippers (e-commerce, retailers, B2B and individuals), logistics operators & 3PLs (fleets with unused capacity), and microhub & retail partners (shops, kiosks, lockers). All three benefit from the same intelligent orchestration engine.

items.question: What are typical cost savings with GoLynk?
items.answer: Most shippers save 30–50% on delivery costs compared to traditional couriers. Savings depend on shipment type, frequency, and corridor; flexible timing typically yields the highest savings.

items.question: Can I choose between fast and economical delivery?
items.answer: Yes. Options: Economical (2–3 days, consolidation), Express (1–2 days, priority routing), Premium (white-glove, temp-controlled, insured). Choose per shipment based on urgency and budget.

items.question: How does tracking work for my customers?
items.answer: You receive live GPS tracking, event notifications, and proof-of-delivery data for sharing with customers. Track and embed links for transparency.

footer.tagline: Orchestrating existing journeys into faster, greener logistics.
